title: vAzhvu miguttu vara
sahitya:
vAzhvu miguttu vara varam tarubavanE vEzha mukhattavanE vEdam kaDandavanE


anupallavi

  Azh kaDal mAlavanin arumai marumaganin arum sOdaranE aruL pozhibavanE nal


caraNam    azhagu vallabhaiyai aNaindavanE anru pazham perum pOTTi tanil venravanE migap-
pazham perum bhAratattai ezhudi muDittavanE vazhipaDum anbarai vAzhttum vinAyakanE
